member.name: INPUT_INJECTION_VALUE.page
member.summary: The Usage Page ID, such as VR Controls Page (0x03) or Game Controls Page (0x05).

member.name: INPUT_INJECTION_VALUE.usage
member.summary: The Usage ID associated with a Usage Page, such as Turn Right/Left (21) or Move Right/Left (24) for a Game Controls Page.

member.name: INPUT_INJECTION_VALUE.index
member.summary: The Usage index, such as the selected item in a radio button set.
